Uses of Interface
util.MessageHandler

Packages that use MessageHandler
gates

Uses of MessageHandler in gates
 

Classes in gates that implement MessageHandler
 class FastAndLooseGate
          This gate will send tokens to the parking lot regardless of how many tokens it has.
 class Gate
          A concrete implementation of the Gate interface.
 class TimeBombGate
          TimeBombGate is an extension of Gate which disconnects from its manager after a given amount of time
 class TokenThiefGate
          The TokenThiefGate is an implementation of Gate which trades tokens with other gates but then doesn't remove them from itself
 

Uses of MessageHandler in manager
 

Classes in manager that implement MessageHandler
 class Manager
          The Manager is our source of truth within this system.
 

Uses of MessageHandler in simulation
 

Classes in simulation that implement MessageHandler
 class TrafficGenerator
          This class encompases all of the TrafficGeneration capabilities within the program.
 

Uses of MessageHandler in util
 

Methods in util that return MessageHandler
 MessageHandler MessageListener.getHandler()
          Gets the handler that this MessageListener passes its messages back to
 

Methods in util with parameters of type MessageHandler
 void MessageListener.setHandler(MessageHandler handler)
          Sets the MessageHandler which is handling messages for this Listener
 

Constructors in util with parameters of type MessageHandler
MessageListener(MessageHandler gateListening, java.net.Socket listeningFor)
          Creates a simulation listener which listens on the given socket
